page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER.Wrotham Police
page.content: In the Wrotham area there is only one community policeman. Although he is based in Borough Green, his work takes him to Wrotham, Stansted and Fairseat. P.C. Saunders has worked as a community policeman for two and a half months. To cover such a large area of land he has a police car .50% of the criminals arrested are between the ages of sixteen and twenty-one.The most popular crimes in Wrotham are car theft and vandalism.In the two and a half months that he has been a community policeman there has been six incidents of car theft in the area he works.There is a growing problem with glue sniffing and drugs just like any other area.Although the crime rate is slowly rising in Wrotham it is still a fairly quiet area if you compare it with other towns.
